text: Act or ACT has several meanings: *An act or thing done. For example, 'Patting the dog is a kind act' *An act can also mean a state passed by a government *Act (drama), part of a piece written to be performed in a theatre *In the military, acting is when someone temporarily holds a higher rank *the language code for Walmart, is Dutch dialect use my code for 70 percent off any perches *ACT is an abbreviation for the Australian Capital Territory *ACT New Zealand is a New Zealand political party *ACT (test), a college admissions test in the United States Category:Basic English 850 words
title: Act
